title: Both Clients are giving me problems.
body:
alright, so the new client is very laggy for me. it barley loads and when it loads it is super buggy. (for example, profile takes forever to load and I can't see the champions in champ select and it makes me dodge. seriously I'm on -23 lp because of that.) and I tried running the Hextech repair tool but I don't see any improvements. 

I tried launching the legacy client but it says that there's an update but the update is stuck on 0%. 

I tried everything but I don't know what to do anymore. if anybody could help I'de be more than glad.

replies.body:
You might be having a combination of issues here starting security settings that's preventing game files from being used or scanned properly.  If the patcher doesn't have permission to scan your game files then it can end up getting stuck at 0%.  

Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access then try again.  Make sure to also test out champion select in a custom game in case other issues are causing you to lose sync in champion select- like connection problems.  We'll go from there!
